title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give effect to two Commission Directives (Directive 
2020/2088/EU of 11 December 2020 and Directive 2020/2088/EU of 11 
December 2020). Directive 2020/2088/EU of 11 December 2020 amends the 
allergenic fragrances listed in the table in the third paragraph of point 11 of 
Part III of Annex II to Directive 2009/48/EC of the European Parliament and of 
the Council on the safety of toys, to include the allergenic fragrances listed in 
Table 1 3-1 of the Scientific Committee on Consumer Safety (SCCS) opinion 
of 26 and 27 June 2012 and amend entry 4 of the table in respect of citronellol. 
Commission Directive 2020/2089/EU of 11 December 2020 amends the table 
on the first paragraph of point 11 of Part III of Annex II to Directive 
2009/48/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on the safety of 
toys, to include the prohibition of the use of atranol, chloroatranol and methyl 
heptine carbonate in toys. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [348] 5
